unnormalised: My uncle, Rajeev Sharma, got caught up in a civil law dispute last year. It started with a property disagreement; his neighbour, Mr. Khan, claimed part of Rajeev's land based on some old papers. The case dragged on for months, with multiple court dates – I think the first hearing was scheduled for 15/07/2023. Adv. Verma, his lawyer, said it could take yrs! The cost of legal fees alone was around ₹50,000. Eventually, they settled out of court, but the whole ordeal was a major headache for everyone.
